articles.title: Rashid Khan gives glowing endorsement of SA20's potential: 'It's not far off IPL'
articles.description: Cricket South Africa (CSA) had expressed that lofty but eminently possible longer-term objective from the outset and the success of the inaugural edition of the SA20 has merely emboldened that view.
articles.content: He acknowledges he could've scalped a few more victims or lashed some late runs, but Afghanistan superstar and MI Cape Town skipper Rashid Khan believes the SA20 is well on its way towards becoming t… [+2304 chars]

articles.title: Legend blasts Indian pitch ‘cheating’ claim
articles.description: India cricket great Ravi Shastri has savaged claims the nation is “cheating” with its handling of the Nagpur pitch for the first Test against Australia.
articles.content:
